name: Laboratory break!
description:
This is an entry part of the Stealth Game Jam. Developed by myself and @archarry86.

https://itch.io/jam/stealth-game-jam

After several experiments , a failed experiment of the government will scape its prison.

Controls 

Press shift to walk in crouch position.

To move press A,S,D,W or LEFT, DONW, RIGHT, UP

Co creator

@archarry86
